Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLLayeredTabView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECTabView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLLayeredTabView
public class SLLayeredTabView
extends ECTabView
ECTabView subclass that applies the stone-texture look using SLLayeredTabItems. This tab view looks right when it just overlaps a raised SLBezelBorder (typically on a ContainerView)
See Also:
SLLayeredTabItem, SLButtonTabView

SLLayeredTabView()
Constructs an SLLayeredTabView object with bounds 0,0,0,0
SLLayeredTabView(int, int, int, int)
Constructs an SLLayeredTabView object with the given bounds
SLLayeredTabView(Rect)
Constructs an SLLayeredTabView object with the given bounds
